alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:58PM CDT until April 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Heath to 9 miles west of Samson, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Kinston, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Perry Store, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Lucile, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Lowry Mill, Central City, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill and Goodman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
